title: [FEATURE] Define HAVE_FREETYPE to support fonts loaded by FreeType
body:
### Problem
For loading **Adobe Type 1 fonts** I need to load them with **FreeType** first and hand the loaded font over to **HarfBuzz** for layout. HarfBuzz has built-in support for it - if enabled at compile time.

Currently `libHarfBuzzSharp.dll` is built without `HAVE_FREETYPE` so the function `hb_ft_font_create` is not available.

### Desired Change
* Update the config.h files to define `HAVE_FREETYPE` (like in https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/dc9b306e283dcb1eef21458a6fe69d5294ceb369/native/windows/libHarfBuzzSharp/config.h)
* C# bindings to `hb_ft_*` functions
* An additional `SKShaper` constructor to directly provide a `HarfBuzzSharp.Font` instead of just `SKTypeface`

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
`SharpFont.HarfBuzz` would actually provide such functionality but doesn't integrate with `HarfBuzzSharp` and therefore SkiaSharp.
Also it is not compatible with .NET Core 3/.NET Standard.
